remarks: Associative identities for the ring of power series.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 25-Nov-2019.)
statement:
psrring.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
psrring.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
psrring.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
psrass.d $e |- D = { f e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' f " NN ) e. Fin } $.
psrass.t $e |- .X. = ( .r ` S ) $.
psrass.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
psrass.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
psrass.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
psrcom.c $e |- ( ph -> R e. CRing ) $.
psrass.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
psrass.n $e |- .x. = ( .s ` S ) $.
psrass.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. K ) $.
psrass23 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( A .x. X ) .X. Y ) = ( A .x. ( X .X. Y ) ) /\ ( X .X. ( A .x. Y ) ) = ( A .x. ( X .X. Y ) ) ) ) $.
$d I f $.
